analysis: The project currently lacks a cohesive black hole theme and animated elements. The CSS file needs to be updated to include cosmic visuals, animations for black hole effects, and glowing elements. The HTML should be enhanced to support animated slides and interactive elements related to black holes. The JavaScript should be completed to ensure smooth animations and transitions.

improvements.description: Implement a dark, cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. Include CSS animations for smooth transitions and interactive effects.
Add animated slides and interactive elements related to black holes, such as buttons to trigger animations and sections to display information about black holes.
Complete the JavaScript to handle animations for black hole visuals, ensure smooth transitions, and add interactivity for the animated slides and elements.
